document.full_text: france telecom and deutsche telekom will share parts of their mobile networks in poland, austria, and romania, which they say may trim 650 million euros in operating and investment costs by 2015, sources said.
document.title: france telecom, deutsche telekom to deepen cooperation: sources
lines_and_colors: france telecom and deutsche telekom will share parts of their mobile networks in poland, austria, and romania, which they say may trim 650 million euros in operating and investment costs by 2015, sources said.
